name: Fantasy World (itch) (Prado Studios)
description:
Fantasy World is a prototype game that uses the Top Down 2D style. You can walk, attack, gather coins, spend them in new items/clothes, talk to NPCs and fight some enemies.

This prototype was developed within 76 hours to attend a task that required a top-down 2D game with the following features:

•A playable character that can walk and interact with the world.

•A functional clothes shop: talking to the shopkeeper, buying and selling items.

You can find out more about us on: https://pradostudios.games

Third-party assets used to develop this prototype game:

  • https://craftpix.net/freebies/free-tropical-medieval-city-2d-tileset/
  • https://craftpix.net/freebies/2d-fantasy-seller-free-character-sprite/
  • https://craftpix.net/freebies/2d-fantasy-woman-warrior-free-sprite-sheets/
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/foley/footsteps-essentials-...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/rpg-music-starter-p...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/40-simple-icons-free-171008
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/coins-crystals-diamonds-vecto...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/fantasy-wooden-gui-free-103811
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/fantasy-2d-character-free-11...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/utilities/lean-pool-35666
  • https://opengameart.org/content/free-keyboard-and-controllers-prompts-pack
